function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Insufficient ventilation leading to indoor air stagnation and high pathogen concentration.","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne disease transmission and reduced air quality.","Mitigation":"Regularly open outside windows, increase air exchange rate, and maintain continuous ventilation.","Technologies":"Energy-saving, bi-directional ventilation fans, external air damper and exhaust air damper control.","People":"Building occupants, especially those in poorly ventilated spaces.","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, and maintenance staff."},{"Description":"Failure to maintain negative pressure in the toilet.","Impact":"Risk of contaminated air from the toilet spreading to other areas.","Mitigation":"Keep exhaust system running continuously and ensure negative pressure in the toilet.","Technologies":"Exhaust system, ventilation rate control.","People":"Building occupants, especially those using the toilet.","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, and maintenance staff."}]}
